Question: Dongguan Jinconn New Material Holdings Co.,Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dongguan Jinconn New Material Holdings Co.,Ltd

Product: Rare Earth Permanent NdFeB Magnet Products

- High energy product, High coercive force, High stability
- Widely used in automotive industry, consumer electronics, industrial automation products, and smart home appliances
- National High-Tech Enterprise, Guangdong Specialized Refined, and Innovative Enterprises, National Little Giant Company
- Focus on rare earth permanent magnet and magnetic component products
- Passed ISO9001, ISO14001, TS16949 international certification system
- Strategic partners with Microsoft, TCL, Hisense, BYD, Foshan Lighting, SKULLCANDY, LITEON, Angshuo electro-acoustic communications
- Strong production capability and comprehensive market competitiveness
- Continuous technological innovation and improvement in production technology and equipment
- Vision to become a benchmark enterprise in China’s magnet industry
Summary_cn:
东莞市金康新材料控股有限公司

产品：稀土永磁钕铁硼磁铁产品

- 高能量产品，高矫顽力，高稳定性
- 广泛应用于汽车行业，消费电子产品，工业自动化产品和智能家电
- 国家高新技术企业，广东专精创新企业，国家小巨人企业
- 专注于稀土永磁和磁性元件产品
- 通过ISO9001，ISO14001，TS16949国际认证体系
- 与微软、TCL、海信、比亚迪、佛山照明、SKULLCANDY、LITEON、昂硕电声通讯等公司建立战略合作伙伴关系
- 具备强大的生产能力和全面的市场竞争力
- 不断进行技术创新和改进生产技术和设备
- 成为中国磁铁行业的标杆企业的愿景
